title: Bronze battleaxe

properties.value: The bronze battleaxe is the weakest battleaxe in RuneScape, with the dragon battleaxe being the strongest. Like all bronze weapons, it requires 1 Attack to wield, and is used exclusively for melee combat. Players can make a bronze battleaxe with the Smithing skill at level 10 using three bronze bars, giving 37.5 experience. It is a slashing weapon, which makes it good for monsters with a slash weakness. Players can purchase this battleaxe from Brian's Battleaxe Bazaar in Port Sarim.

Item ID1375

The bronze battleaxe is the weakest battleaxe in RuneScape, with the dragon battleaxe being the strongest. Like all bronze weapons, it requires 1 Attack to wield, and is used exclusively for melee combat. Players can make a bronze battleaxe with the Smithing skill at level 10 using three bronze bars, giving 37.5 experience. It is a slashing weapon, which makes it good for monsters with a slash weakness. Players can purchase this battleaxe from Brian's Battleaxe Bazaar in Port Sarim.

[[File:Bronze battleaxe detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''bronze battleaxe''' is the weakest [[battleaxe]] in ''[[RuneScape]]'', with the [[dragon battleaxe]] being the strongest. Like all [[bronze weapons]], it requires 1 [[Attack]] to wield, and is used exclusively for [[melee]] combat. Players can make a bronze battleaxe with the [[Smithing]] skill at level 10 using three [[bronze bar]]s, giving 37.5 experience. It is a [[slashing]] weapon, which makes it good for monsters with a slash weakness. Players can purchase this battleaxe from [[Brian's Battleaxe Bazaar]] in [[Port Sarim]].
